17  
18  package org.apache.log4j.util;
19  
20  import org.apache.oro.text.perl.Perl5Util;
21  
22  public class XMLTimestampFilter implements Filter {
23  
24    Perl5Util util = new Perl5Util();
25  
26    public 
27    String filter(String in) {
28      if(util.match("/timestamp=\"\\d{10,13}\"/", in)) {
29        return util.substitute("s/timestamp=\"\\d{10,13}\"/timestamp=\"XXX\"/", in);
30      } else {
31        return in;
32      }
33    }
34  }
